PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-11732019-08-07,  ,  ISED,  NRC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Research Council of Canada - The Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder approving the ENTRY by National Research Council of Canada into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Professional Institute of the Public Service of Canada that covers all employees in the INFORMATION SERVICES bargaining unit for the period beginning on June 21, 2018 and ending on June 20, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
